description: This PHP script handles WPS (Wi-Fi Protected Setup) configuration actions such as enabling/disabling WPS, setting WPS methods, pairing clients via push button or pin, and cancelling sessions. It processes incoming POST data containing configuration info and applies changes to Wi-Fi settings accordingly.

methods.name: validChecksum
methods.description: Validates the checksum or PIN provided for WPS pairing, supporting 4 and 8 digit PIN formats.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Applies Wi-Fi SSID settings for a specific SSID based on its ID.
